Sentencas: La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-delta (LCF6535) displayed higher oxygen permeation flux (J(O2)) compared to La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) and could potentially replace the typical cathodes employed in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: However, the oxide ion conduction and surface exchange reaction of the LCF6535 have not been studied thus far.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: This study investigates the ion conductivity and surface exchange reaction of LCF6535 by simultaneous investigation of the oxygen permeation flux and oxygen chemical potential.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: The ion conductivity (sigma(i)) of LCF6535 was determined to be 0.29 S cm(-1) at 1000 degrees C, and this high sigma(i) is the key contributor to the high J(O2) of LCF6535.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: Furthermore, the J(O2) of LCF 6535 at 800 and 850 degrees C was found to be limited by surface exchange reaction on the low oxygen partial pressure (P-l) side.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: The rate-determining step for the surface exchange reaction was determined to be the charge transfer relating to O-2 molecule desorption, which results from the lower hole concentration on the P-l side under the reduction condition.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study

Sentencas: The increase in hole concentration achieved on the P-1 side is a possible solution for improving the surface exchange reaction and oxygen permeability.
Titulo: Oxide Ion Conduction and Surface Exchange Reactions of Mixed Conductive La0.65Ca0.35FeO3-δ Based on Oxygen Permeation Study
